Instance.description: Formation social groups revolve around sims in a group following a routing anchor object and walking in a formation.

TunableVariant.name: formation_tuning
TunableVariant.description: A list of routing formations. One will be chosen based on the number of members of the group. It will use the closest match based on the number of offsets in the formation. Note that you will generally always want to use the 'follow' formation type here. (This may be tuned in place here using 'literal' or as a reference to a RoutingFormationList tuning snippet.)

TunableTuple.name: literal
TunableTuple.description: A tunable list of routing formations, along with functionality to choose the most appropriate formation based on number of routing slaves.

TunableList.name: formations
TunableList.description: A list of routing formations. One will be chosen based on the number of members of the group. It will use the closest match based on the number of offsets in the formation. Note that you will generally always want to use the 'follow' formation type here.

Tunable.name: reference
Tunable.description: A reference to a RoutingFormationList tuning snippet.

Tunable.name: minimum_paired_angle
Tunable.description: Minimum angle between sims in formation (from straight ahead/behind) for paired conversation to be attempted. (ignored if for actor sim No sim is far enough off)

TunableTuple.name: routing_event_delay
TunableTuple.description: Delay between the START of a routing event to when the next one can first be scheduled in real world seconds

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: routing_events
TunableList.description: Events and weight for paired events. Only one pair can occur within the specified routing event delay. To avoid overlap, minimum delay must be longer than duration of route event.

Tunable.name: actor_event
Tunable.description: A paired route event for the sim tested as the actor sim.

TunableTuple.name: chance
TunableTuple.description: Percent Chance that the Route Event pair will play.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_chance.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_chance if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

Tunable.name: target_event
Tunable.description: A paired route event for the sim tested as the target sim.

Tunable.name: weight
Tunable.description: The weight to assign to this event.

Tunable.name: routing_object
Tunable.description: An object with a routing component that will be used as the anchor object for this group.

Tunable.name: routing_object_off_state
Tunable.description: object state to deactivate the routing object.

Tunable.name: routing_object_on_state
Tunable.description: object state to activate the routing object.
